text: 5:32: Mat 19:9; Mk 10:11,12; Luk 16:18; 1 Kor 7:10,11 Hannirese atûn Keiman chu: tukhom pasalin a lômnu hah roi danga niloiin, taksôn omloina sika a mâka anin chu a lômnu hah inrê a minchang ani; male mi lômnu mâksai inneipui nôkpu chu amanu hah a inrêpuiin theiloi a changsa ani, ti nangni ki ril ani.
